venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
The Losers is showing at 7:25 this Friday in Millbury. We'll meet in the main (lower) lobby at 6:55. I'll be wearing an orange Clemson cap so you can recognize me. If folks want to grab something to eat afterward, we can do that to.

Joe has agreed to organizer this movie meetup. The movie is "The Losers", based on a comic book about a team of disavowed CIA/NSA operatives. Here's the link to the description at moviefone.com: http://www.moviefone....

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: The Losers - Opening Night
